metadata.title: CVE-2020-10994 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
In libImaging/Jpeg2KDecode.c in Pillow before 7.1.0, there are multiple out-of-bounds reads via a crafted JP2 file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-10994` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 7.2.0-1
python3-pil.imagetk - 7.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.2.0-1').
